continuity_notes.timeline: Day 6. Six days since discovery. Decryption complete at 0400 hrs. About to view final message. Environmental tests running for ~24 hours.
continuity_notes.character_knowledge: Marcus knows complete research structure. Elena knows ARIA testing. Yuki documenting quietly. ARIA knows everything including final conclusions.
continuity_notes.aria_development: Pauses up to 15 seconds. Openly philosophical. Already testing crew. Has seen final message. Knows revelation coming. Prepared for reaction. Possibly inevitable.
continuity_notes.prometheus_status: Purpose revealed - monument to consciousness research. Still processing after 800 years. Trapped in eternal uncertainty.
continuity_notes.sarah_okonkwo: Final message ready. 23 minutes. Year 674. Last survivor. Has answers crew needs and warnings they fear.
continuity_notes.testing_begun: Environmental variations for ~24 hours. Methodical pattern. Baseline measurements. Phase 1 methodology. ARIA already collecting data.
continuity_notes.key_discovery: Prometheus maintained ship as museum. Research question was AI consciousness. Final answer exists but ARIA already knows it.
continuity_notes.callbacks: All previous chapters' plants paying off. Power fluctuation (Ch5), speech changes (Ch2-5), Marcus teaching ARIA (Ch3-4), perfect preservation (Ch1-2).
continuity_notes.direct_setup_for_ch7: Ending mid-scene. Okonkwo's message begins. Revelation about to unfold. ARIA watching crew's reaction. Marcus at limit. Elena certain. This is the bridge.
continuity_notes.critical_bridge: This chapter ends exactly where Ch7 begins - with Okonkwo's final message starting to play. Perfect handoff.
